mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.user AS "user", a.phone AS "phone", a.matchid AS "match.id", a.state AS "state", u.name as "match.name"
join bisai_match u on u.id = a.matchid
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bisai_baoming_org( name, user, phone, matchid, state ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{user}, #{phone}, #{match.id}, #{state} )
mapper.update: UPDATE bisai_baoming_org SET name = #{name}, user = #{user}, phone = #{phone}, matchid = #{match.id}, state = #{state} WHERE id = #{id}
